body.name: ViewSonic VA1903H 19-Inch WXGA 1366x768p 16:9 Widescreen Monitor with Enhanced View Comfort, Custom ViewModes and HDMI for Home and Office,Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 6 hrs 5 mins
features: VERSATILE MONITOR: 19 Inch WXGA (1366x768p) monitor with 60Hz refresh rate
16:9 WIDESCREEN: Ideal for business and government-specific legacy applications
ENHANCED VIEWING COMFORT: Flicker-Free technology and Blue Light Filter for reduced eye fatigue
OPTIMIZED VIEW SETTINGS: Offers “Game,” “Movie,” “Web,” “Text,” and “Mono” presets
FLEXIBLE CONNECTIVITY: The VA1903H supports laptops, PCs, Macs and more with HDMI, and VGA inputs
body.description: The ViewSonic VA1903h is a 19” (18.5” viewable) widescreen monitor that delivers value and performance for both home offices and small businesses. Equipped with an HDMI input, a fast 5ms response time, and rich color performance, the VA1903h is great for a variety of applications ranging from viewing office documents to surfing the web. ViewSonic’s exclusive ViewMode feature provides intuitive presets for optimized screen performance in different applications. In addition, Flicker-Free technology and a Blue Light Filter help to eliminate eye strain from extended viewing periods for improved productivity. An energy-saving Eco-mode reduces cost of ownership, making the VA1903h a great choice for both government and education.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ViewSonic VA1903h ViewSonic VA1903H 19-Inch WXGA 1366x768p 16:9 Widescreen Monitor with Enhanced View Comfort, Custom ViewModes and HDMI for Home and Office The ViewSonic VA1903h is a 19” (18.5” viewable) widescreen monitor that delivers value and performance for both home offices and small businesses. Equipped with HDMI input, a fast 5ms response time, and rich color performance, the VA1903h is great for a variety of applications ranging from viewing office documents to surfing the web. ViewSonic’s exclusive ViewMode feature provides intuitive presets for optimized screen performance in different applications. In addition, Flicker-Free technology and a Blue Light Filter help to eliminate eye strain from extended viewing periods for improved productivity. An energy-saving Eco-mode reduces cost of ownership, making the VA1903h a great choice for both government and education. VESA-Compatible Mount Design Mount the monitor as you see fit using its convenient VESA-compatible mount design. Features 16:9 Widescreen The Power of HDMI Optimized View Settings Enhanced View Comfort

Features 16:9 Widescreen Equipped with a 16:9 aspect ratio and 1366x768 native resolution, this monitor is designed for multitasking and improving productivity for a variety of applications. The Power of HDMI HDMI is a future-proof video standard that delivers true digital picture and audio clarity. The HDMI interface on this monitor allows you to connect to a variety of HD devices including gaming consoles, Blu-ray players, laptop PCs, digital cameras, and many others for the ultimate true high-definition experience. Optimized View Settings ViewSonic’s unique ViewMode feature offers “Game,” “Movie,” “Web,” “Text,” and “Mono” presets. These presets enhance gamma curve, color temperature, contrast, and brightness to deliver an optimized viewing experience for different screen applications. Enhanced View Comfort Flicker-Free technology and a Blue Light Filter help to eliminate eyestrain from extended viewing periods.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked right out of the box - Happy
reviews.reviewText: Purchased as a slave screen for a piece of communications gear, chose this model for size, cost, and because it had both VGA and HDMI inputs. The instruction Guide, written in minuscule text and dozens of languages was nearly useless. It did not match the presentations on the screen. Fortunately, the unit "Auto-Starts" and appears to take care of everything. Upon turn-on, unit worked 100%. Nice color. Nice resolution. Would recommend for someone needing a smaller unit without any bells or whistles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good Monitor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delivers a good quality display.
reviews.reviewText: God quality product and I bought it at a very good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice smaller monitor
reviews.reviewText: The monitor was easy to setup and connect with my laptop. The features I like most are the size of the monitor, ease of setup, and ability to connect with my laptop via hdmi. The unit does not come with an HDMI cable, you’ll need to buy this separately. The monitor tilts about 15 degrees. The color on the screen is fair. It is not as rich as the color on my Mac air screen. It would be nice If the monitor was height adjustable. The manufacturer description of the monitor is accurate. Overall, very satisfied with the product for the price paid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is was it said and it's great
reviews.reviewText: I got this specifically because it says it easier on the eyes and it is.It's been a little difficult to go from a 24 to 19 in h, but that's part of why it's working so well for me personally. But for ny extreme astigmatism, been very helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Lousy resolution, garish inaccurate color
reviews.reviewText: This replaced a 15-year old LCD monitor that was sharp as a tack with excellent color accuracy. As other reviewers have noted, comes with no instructions of any kind in the box, and what you can find on-line is vague and barely approaches basic. There is limited adjustment of the picture that is done on the monitor itself, with these four small black buttons that are completely invisible in the black frame unless I shine a flashlight on them? Really? You couldn't make them silver, or protrude from the bottom so they're visible? The resolution, even on the highest setting 1280x1024 has text so ragged and pixelated it causes eye fatigue, and full-screen images like photos or art are blurry. Color is neon screaming to the point of being garish, with no easy way to mute it to a more natural setting-- gold for instance appears olive colored, and lemon yellow is more ochre. Black type has two edges- one red and one black, which contributes to the fuzzy and washed out appearance of type and makes it super fatiguing to read. And this is with the "natural" setting-- the others geared to gaming make it more garish and unviewable. There is no sharpness or smoothing ability, to try and get rid of the ragged edges and blurry images-- downscaling the resolution only makes it predictably worse. This is either defective out of the box, or this is just the way it is and it's a real piece of crap. Needed this aspect ratio to fit in a confining cabinet, so will have to go with the standard wide ratio and use a much smaller screen to fit in this space. This product is the worst monitor I have even seen. My first computer bought 30 years ago had a better image than this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and small easy to install and works well.
reviews.reviewText: I like the fact that the screen was a small one and not the big 24 inches that they have lots of. I needed it for my desktop and the size was just perfect. I really did not want to have to purchase anything bigger. So this works out just fine for me. The color and brightness works well and it is very easy on the eyes. I think that the price could have been less though. No need to charge so much for a monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen Monitor, excelente imagen y buenas opciones de conectividad
reviews.reviewText: Mi primer criterio de búsqueda para adquirir este monitor Viewsonic VA1903H 19", es que contara con salida de video estándar y además con HDMI, todo resuelto. La tarjeta de vídeo de mi PC cuenta con ambas salidas y ambas funcionan. Ya he tenido monitores ViewSonic y su calidad de imagen, refresco, facilidad de configurar y modificar funciones lo hacen una gran compra. Estoy muy satisfecho y trabajando con él.

Bought this as extra monitor to pair with my 15.6” laptop. Great quality for the price and very easy to set up, just plug in and set the resolution to your liking. Very happy with it. It’s very flat and doesn’t take up much space on the desk.
El tamaño es bueno para lo que necesito, fotos e imágenes para el dibujo, claro mas grande seria ideal por la resolución, pero por espacio me acomodo.
Small, functional and inexpensive. If you have the space, you can get a bigger monitor for the same price, or a little more. But, if not, then this is ideal.
